text: Bornellidae is a family of sea snails or sea slugs, marine gastropod mollusks in the superfamily Tritonioidea. This family is within the clade Cladobranchia (according to the taxonomy of the Gastropoda by Bouchet & Rocroi, 2005). == Taxonomy == The family Bornellidae consists of the following subfamilies (according to the taxonomy of the Gastropoda by Bouchet & Rocroi, 2005): ==Genera == * Bornella Gray, 1850 (with at least ten species) * Bornellopsis O'Donoghue, 1929 *Pseudobornella Baba, 1932 (monotypic : P. orientalis) ==References== Category:Gastropod families
title: Bornellidae
